item.description:
Let's start 2009 out with a great big Cribbage Meet Up !!

Can't wait to see Y'all and hear about your Holiday Fun Fest Times and Vacations (Emad Hawaii) :) :) :)

Want to know what Santa brought everyone !! or if you were bad :) like my pillow stated: Oh Darn, I forgot to be good :( I bet that was a change for me :) :) NOT!

Will really miss Bette who will be skiing up in NH at her winter abode and playing ACC Cribbage :) April???

Teresa please enjoy Christmas with your new teen!! and Laura with your 'tweenie'..
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with Cribbage Boards Out
item.name: 2009 Waltham Cribbage Meet Up
